name: ICICIDC100
line: Get flat ₹100 discount using ICICI Bank Debit Cards
terms: Applicable once per user per month
Valid on Friday between 7 PM to 11:59 PM only
Valid on all ICICI Bank Debit Cards
Other T&C's may apply
Offer valid till Jan 27, 2023 11:59 PM

name: ICICINB100
line: Get flat ₹100 discount using ICICI Bank Net Banking
terms: Applicable for the first 15000 orders per week; once per user per month
Valid only from Friday to Sunday
Valid only on ICICI Bank Net Banking payment mode
Other T&Cs may apply
Offer valid till Jan 29, 2023 11:59 PM

name: INDUSIND100
line: Get 20% discount using IndusInd Bank Credit Cards
description: Maximum discount up to ₹100 on orders above ₹400
terms: Valid only on Fridays
Applicable once per user per week
Valid only on IndusInd Bank Credit Cards
Other T&C may apply
Offer valid till Jan 27, 2023 11:59 PM

name: CITIFOODIE
line: Get 15% discount using Citi Bank Cards
description: Maximum discount up to ₹300 on orders above ₹1200
terms: Applicable once per user per week; twice during the offer period
Valid only from Friday to Sunday
Valid only on CITI Credit & Debit Cards
Not valid on CITI Corporate Credit Cards
Add-on cards will be treated as separate
Other T&Cs may apply
Offer valid till Jan 29, 2023 11:59 PM
